name: Peace
description: Peace is a time travel game wherein an astronaut from earth seeks to establish Peace and harmony on the planet Zuba somewhere in outer space. His mission is to fight the boss who are known as souls on the planet and win back the technology that is crucial to earth and its progress. This game explores all ages ranging from stone age till the alienistic or modern age. A simple Platformer style game with just simple jumping and shooting mechanics , guaranteed for a perfect entertainment. The challenges presented level by level makes the game all the more interesting.
